publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2012.2 Ms Margo MacDonald: Holyrood Project—As an amendment to motion (S1M-2012) in the name of Des McNulty, leave out from "further notes" to end and insert "directs the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body to abide by the appropriate recommendations contained in the Spencely Report and to complete the Holyrood project within a budget agreed by the Parliament after the Parliament has been properly informed of the funding sources for required capital expenditure beyond £195 million." Supported by: Donald Gorrie*
